Ice::

She looked at Veratis with a smile on her face. "Well, maybe being 
cooped up in the lab for another day won't be so bad after all. this 
could be rather fun." She smiled. Feeling a little cocky, she closed 
her eyes and envisioned Veratis in her mind. She then opened her eyes 
and concetrated. She tried to lift Veratis off the floor by a few 
inches. She felt a slight drain of energy as she tried.
